The specific aim ( 1 ) conduct randomize non-inferiority trial compare supportive-expressive psychodynamic therapy cognitive therapy patient MDD ( 2 ) ass comparative effectiveness supportive-expressive psychodynamic therapy cognitive therapy secondary measure symptom , patient functioning , quality life . Patient mediator outcome also examine additional grant award Paul Crits-Christoph , Ph.D . This grant fund National Institutes Mental Health - RO1MH092363-01 . This grant entitle : '' The mechanism cognitive dynamic therapy community setting . '' Recruitment occur solely community mental health clinic around Philadelphia .
